page.title: 17Mill Lodge Guest House
page.content: {Mill House Guest House}is situated on the{A23 at Salfords,}just 3 miles {North of Gatwick Airport.}The accomodation comprises of{9 bedrooms, 6 of which are guest rooms with wash basins and tea/ coffee facilities. There is also a t.v. lounge and dining room where a full{English breakfast}is served from 7a.m. or a continental breakfast for the early risers. Being so close to Gatwick the majority of the guests are either in-bound or out-bound passengers and require only over- night accomodation. Transport is available both to and from the airport and the extensive carparking facilities make life much easier for those going abroad.The majority of overseas guests are American who like English B. & B.s.
